name: Dungeon and Gravestone
storyline:
Arise! The time for sleep has passed. The world needs you now, more than ever, as the threat of destruction looms closer with each passing moment.

The path of salvation lies ahead with only one way to attain it. You must conquer the dungeon and its keeper that awaits you. Beware not to outstay your welcome as your life energy is slowly drained the longer you stay in the dungeon.
summary: Death and resurrection, death and resurrection. There is a world full of grief and sadness, were only end of life is certain. In this world, there is a city where people take annihilation for granted, and this city is grim like an empty shell. Who am I? Just stepping into the dungeon in front of me… Rogue-like RPG where one dies over and over again. Generated dungeons are full of difficult traps and puzzles. Putting one’s life on the line, player is challenged with over 500 quests, weapon and item collection, fishing. How deep can you dive? Defy the unprecedented dungeon automatic generation algorithm! Finally find out what lies beyond the deep dungeon…
